thread.title: Definitely stay here!
thread.title_full: Definitely stay here! - Review of 11 Howard, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: melissa b
title: Definitely stay here!
text:
My husband and I stayed at 11 Howard for about six weeks over the summer due to renovations in our apartment and we only have positive things to say about this property. The staff is wonderful, especially Xena and Indigo, and the hotel is just great. It is new, clean, modern, and in a great location. The Library, the Blond, and the conference / meeting rooms are all wonderful venues for eating, drinks or a gathering. I would highly recommend for New Yorkers looking for a staycation or for those visiting New York. We were in two different rooms - one on 10 and one on the PH floor and both were wonderful. We had an especially great view on the higher PH floor facing east.
Room Tip: make sure you are on a higher floor, you don't want the noise of The Blond See more room tips
